alert.note: Alert for New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 28 at 8:26PM EDT until July 28 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN NEW CASTLE...NORTHWESTERN SALEM...SOUTH CENTRAL CHESTER AND SOUTHWESTERN DELAWARE COUNTIES... At 826 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ashland, or 7 miles northwest of Wilmington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Newark, Pennsville, Carneys Point, Elsmere, Kennett Square, New Castle, Penns Grove, West Grove, Newport, Arden, Stanton, North Star, Talleyville, Wilmington Manor, Elam, Pike Creek, Chelsea, Ashland and Greenville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 1. Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 8 and 23. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 3 and 6. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
